citations.narrative:
On Aug 5, 2023, a visit to the facility confirmed regulated activity, in the form of exhibition, was being conducted. The
facility previously applied for a license and were contacted about that application so were aware of the requirements for
conducting the regulated activity.
No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale without a valid license, except persons who
are exempt from the licensing requirements. This facility does not fall under one of the exempt categories.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner of the facility.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
On Aug 5, 2023, a visit to the facility confirmed regulated activity, in the form of exhibition, was being conducted. The 
facility previously applied for a license and were contacted about that application so were aware of the requirements for 
conducting the regulated activity. 
No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale without a valid license, except persons who 
are exempt from the licensing requirements. This facility does not fall under one of the exempt categories.  
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner of the facility.
